subject: Trying yet another new method
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
This one is a digital dowsing system or the paranormal puck.  This is 
Bill Chappell's latest project and for those interested can go to 
www.digitaldowsing.com and check it out.  Seems to work well so far and 
this puck has so many bells and whistles that investigators would 
definitely benefit from having one.

-Steve H.
